bill.title: Appropriations Bill, 2025-2026
bill.description: Make Appropriations And To Provide Revenues To Meet The Ordinary Expenses Of State Government For The Fiscal Year Beginning July 1, 2025, To Regulate The Expenditure Of Such Funds, And To Further Provide For The Operation Of State Government During This Fiscal Year And For Other Purposes. - Ratified Title

history.action: Introduced, read first time, placed on calendar without reference
Read third time and sent to Senate
Committee report: Favorable with amendment Finance
Read third time and returned to House with amendments
House insists upon amendment and conference committee appointed Reps. Bannister, Hewitt, Stavrinakis
Conference committee appointed Peeler, Jackson, Alexander
Effective date See Act for Effective Date
